body:
Hi guys so I got my map accepted and so did some other people and I was just wondering around when will it be in rotation, I knew it was not going to come today and I'm not sure about tommorow.

Thanks,
-Ebirdy

title: When will the maps be updated?

replies.body: it has to get tested for bugs. derp. I don't think 1 or 2 days will fit for bug testing
replies.body_tagged: it has to get tested for bugs. derp. I don't think 1 or 2 days will fit for bug testing

replies.body:
Accepted maps are not 100% guaranteed to be in the rotations, just to let you know.
And rotations will be updated less frequently now, instead, every time a rotation update comes, we'll be releasing maps in a bunch :)
replies.body_tagged:
Accepted maps are not 100% guaranteed to be in the rotations, just to let you know.
And rotations will be updated less frequently now, instead, every time a rotation update comes, we'll be releasing maps in a bunch :)

replies.body: Evocal what do you mean that they won't be 100% I'm rotation, but if it gets accepted it gets accepted?!
replies.body_tagged: Evocal what do you mean that they won't be 100% I'm rotation, but if it gets accepted it gets accepted?!

replies.body: I believe they get it tested for bugs and if there are too many bugs or they think gameplay won't be fun it doesn't get accepted
replies.body_tagged: I believe they get it tested for bugs and if there are too many bugs or they think gameplay won't be fun it doesn't get accepted
